casebody.data:
Joseph Ancona v. Board of Television and Radio Examiners (9380)

Foti, Landau and Heiman, Js.

Argued April 22 decision released May 14, 1991 Donald E. Wasik, assistant attorney general, with whom, on the brief, was Richard Blumenthal, attorney general, for the appellant-appellee (defendant). Donald L. Mackie, for the appellee-appellant (plaintiff). Per Curiam.

We find no merit to the appeal or the cross appeal.

The judgment is affirmed.
